art_deco_culinary.name: Art Deco Culinary Kitchen
art_deco_culinary.description: 1920s-inspired kitchen with geometric elegance, luxury finishes, and sophisticated functionality
art_deco_culinary.flooring: Black and white geometric marble with art deco pattern inlays
art_deco_culinary.backsplash: Handcrafted tiles in deep emerald green with gold geometric patterns
art_deco_culinary.walls: Soft cream walls with gold-trimmed decorative panels and sunburst wallpaper accent
art_deco_culinary.ceiling: Coffered ceiling in cream with gold leaf accents and geometric detailing
art_deco_culinary.lighting: Crystal and brass art deco chandelier, brass dome pendant lights over island, gold sconces
art_deco_culinary.ventilation: Ornate brass and copper chimney with decorative geometric grille
art_deco_culinary.cabinets: High-gloss black cabinets with polished brass art deco hardware and geometric inlay details
art_deco_culinary.countertops: Black marble with gold beveled edges and geometric border inlays
art_deco_culinary.appliances: Vintage-style appliances in champagne gold or stainless steel with art deco detailing
art_deco_culinary.style_features: Geometric patterns, symmetry, luxurious textures, metallic accents, theatrical elegance
art_deco_culinary.prompt_keywords: art deco kitchen, geometric patterns, gold accents, black cabinets, marble flooring, brass fixtures, 1920s glamour, sophisticated culinary space
